edu.rit.pj2.tracker

Class BackendSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rit.pj2.tracker.Sender
      • edu.rit.pj2.tracker.BackendSender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BackendRef

    public class BackendSender
extends Sender
implements BackendRef
    Class BackendSender provides an object for sending messages to a Backend. A backend sender must be attached to a Proxy before the backend sender can be used.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BackendSender()
      Construct a new backend sender.
